nodes.title: Scribal Lab — Manuscripts & Hermetic Calligraphy
nodes.summary: Recreate rubricated manuscripts with parchment, oak-gall ink emulation, and calm goldleaf.
nodes.safe_use: Muted palettes; no high-contrast black/white; slow gestures; no flicker.
procedures: Lay parchment ground; draw faint baselines at 6–8% opacity.
Set body text (EB Garamond) at gentle gray; rubricate initials in vermilion.
Apply goldleaf overlay to margins/initials; keep shimmer static (ND-safe).
Export: PNG preview; 16-bit TIFF master.

nodes.title: Pigment Lab — Ultramarine, Vermilion, Malachite, Gold
nodes.summary: Layered glazes emulating historical pigments in ND-safe color discipline.
nodes.safe_use: Digital emulation only; avoid neon; build 3–5 thin glazes.
procedures: Ground: alabaster (#F4F1E9).
Glaze 1: ultramarine at 40–55% (multiply/soft-light).
Glaze 2: malachite at 25–40% (gentle hue shift).
Accents: vermilion sparingly; gold overlay < 10% area.
Export 16-bit TIFF master; create 2048px PNG preview.

nodes.title: Geometry Lab — Vesica, Hexagram, Rose 12, Golden Rectangle
nodes.summary: Exact constructions for cathedral geometry; parametric and ND-safe.
nodes.safe_use: Calm lines; no fast animation; exact math (no eyeballing).
procedures: Vesica: centers separated by radius r; stroke width 6–10px.
Hexagram: 6 points at 60°; draw two equilateral triangles.
Rose 12: petals at 30° increments; keep petal symmetry clean.
Golden rectangle: subdivide by φ; optional quiet spiral.

nodes.title: Harmonic Lab — Tones, Ratios, Calm Resonance
nodes.summary: Teach and render musical intervals (432Hz grid) with ND-safe gains. Link color ↔ tone for synesthetic study.
nodes.safe_use: Never autoplay. Cap gain at 0.03. Respect system 'reduce motion/sounds'.
procedures: Pick an interval from data/atelier/harmonics.json.
Compute Hz: base_hz * ratio.
On user tap, ramp gain to ≤ nd_safe.gain_max; hold ≤ 2s; release.
Optionally tint the plate with a corresponding calm color.
references: Guido d’Arezzo (neumes), Paul Foster Case (tones for Tarot)

nodes.title: Architecture Lab — Calm Vaults & Sacred Proportion
nodes.summary: Procedural vaults, rib tracings, proportion studies. ND-safe stone and gold accents.
nodes.safe_use: Limit shimmer; no screen-space flicker. Prefer static or ultra-slow light sweeps.
procedures: Choose vault id (ribbed_semicircle or pointed_gothic).
Set span and rise proportions; trace ribs with even stroke.
Apply rosslyn_stone albedo; optional gold_accent at keystone.
Export plate; compose with pigment/geometry labs.
references: Rosslyn Chapel tracery studies, Vitruvian modules

nodes.title: Psyche Lab — Quiet Mandalas & Visionary Discipline
nodes.summary: Phyllotaxis and gentle L-systems for dream mandalas; Jung/von Franz informed symbolism with ND-safe palettes.
nodes.safe_use: Soft edges; low saturation; allow pause; no recursive motion spirals.
procedures: Pick 'phyllotaxis_quiet' from psyche.json; render 144 points at 137.5°.
Choose palette 'dream_indigo' or 'rose_saturn'; opacity ≤ 0.75.
Optionally place small planetary glyph at center (12–18% opacity).
Export 16-bit master and 2048px preview.
references: Jung — Liber Novus, Marie-Louise von Franz
